# Known Issues & Roadmap

Within this documentation, the following is known to be wrong, flawed, or contrived.

## Infrastructure & Layout

* The infrastructure, Git Hub pages, is not suitable for production-level B2B software documentation.
  * In reality, I would look for a more suitable web framework.
* Typically, I would separate scripting and navigation from content files, so as to avoid repetition. 

## Images

* Wherobots UI Images were created in paint and do not exist on the production site.
* Resulting geospatial visualization images were generated by artificial intelligence.

## Product

* Workflows are facile and I acknowledge that they would be more complicated to both achieve and document in reality.
